recipes.name: Curry Chicken
recipes.ingredients: chicken, curry cube, vegetables of choice
recipes.steps: chop, put in a pot, stew

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.ingredients: flour, sugar, eggs, butter, chocolate chips
recipes.steps: preheat oven, mix all ingredients together, bake at 350 degress Fahrenheit

recipes.name: Shrimp Tempura
recipes.steps: make the batter, dredge the shrimp, fry at a high temperature
recipes.notes: test oil with a tiny drop of batter to see if it is hot enough
